org.apache.james.protocols.lib.netty

Class AbstractConfigurableAsyncServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.james.protocols.netty.AbstractAsyncServer
      • org.apache.james.protocols.lib.netty.AbstractConfigurableAsyncServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, LogEnabled, org.apache.james.protocols.api.ProtocolServer, ServerMBean
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractProtocolAsyncServer, IMAPServer

    public abstract class AbstractConfigurableAsyncServer
extends org.apache.james.protocols.netty.AbstractAsyncServer
implements LogEnabled, Configurable, ServerMBean
    Abstract base class for Servers for all James Servers
